using namespace std;

#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>

#define wl while
#define fl(i,a,b) for(i=a; i<b; i++)

int main()
{
	int cases, n;
	scanf("%d", &cases);
	while(cases--)
	{
		scanf("%d", &n);
		printf("%d\n", (10*n*n*n)-(6*n*n));
	}
	return 0;
}
